sentences.en: ...traditional industries such as coal mining and steel making.
sentences.cn: …像采煤和炼钢这样的传统工业。

sentences.en: A few horse-drawn carts still trundle through the dilapidated mining villages.
sentences.cn: 几架马车仍然在破落的矿村中曲折行进。

sentences.en: He amassed a fortune from silver mining.
sentences.cn: 他靠开采银矿积累了一笔财富。

sentences.en: He was born at Aberdare in South Wales, the son of a mining engineer.
sentences.cn: 他出生在南威尔士的阿伯德尔，是一位采矿工程师的儿子。

sentences.en: He was trained there as a mining engineer.
sentences.cn: 他在那里被培养成一名采矿工程师.

sentences.en: His novel is a vivid portrayal of life in a mining community.
sentences.cn: 他的小说生动地描绘了矿区的生活.

sentences.en: It is the largest ever private foreign investment in the Bolivian mining sector.
sentences.cn: 这是玻利维亚矿业史上最大的一次来自国外的私人投资。

sentences.en: Lonrho's mining and minerals businesses showed some improvement.
sentences.cn: 朗荷公司的采矿及矿产业务有了些起色。

sentences.en: Mining activities have totally disrupted the traditional way of life of the Yanomami Indians.
sentences.cn: 采矿已经彻底扰乱了扬诺马米印第安人传统的生活方式。

sentences.en: Mining rose by 9.1%, manufacturing by 9.4% and services by 4.3%.
sentences.cn: 采矿业增长了9.1%，制造业增长了9.4%，服务业增长了4.3%。

sentences.en: Mining would pollute the lake and denude the forest.
sentences.cn: 采矿会污染湖水，毁掉森林。

sentences.en: Our long-suffering mining communities deserve better than this.
sentences.cn: 我们长期受苦受难的采矿群体应该得到比这更好的待遇。

sentences.en: The dispute is about wages, working conditions and the management of the mining industry.
sentences.cn: 这场争论围绕着工资、工作条件以及矿业管理展开。
